poem:
Title: 'The Green Defiance'

In the game of power's cruel jest,
The green-eyed MEP takes her stand.
Promises swept on a bitter west,
In the court of the centre-right band.
Ursula's throne, beckoning far-right strain,
Yet, Reintke sings an unyielding refrain.
"No second term," the echo vibrates,
On the field where compromise traitorates. 
Stoic is the face of the Green's fight,
In the deafening silence of political night.
